name: Red Moon: Survival
description:
One night the moon, which normally shone bright and white, had turned a deep, eerie shade of red. As the night wore on, people began to feel strange. They felt a hunger deep inside them, a hunger that could not be satisfied. It wasn't long before they began to turn on each other, attacking and biting those around them.
Before anyone knew it, people started to turn into zombies. They roamed the streets, seeking out any remaining survivors to feed on. Towns were overrun with the undead.

- Explore a vast open world filled with many building and areas

- Fight against the living and the dead

- Hunt animals for food

- Improve your skills overtime by gathering experience

- Trade goods with other survivors

- Build or occupy an existing house

- Collect or buy guns from other survivors

- Use tools to gather resources such as wood or minerals

- Burn down hordes of zombies
